      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OAuth2WebClientOptions OAuth2WebClientOptions.setLeeway(int leeway)
      Set a default leeway in seconds to be considered while validating tokens for expiration.
      OAuth2WebClientOptions OAuth2WebClientOptions.setRenewTokenOnForbidden(boolean renewTokenOnForbidden)
      Set a default behavior on how to handle the first forbidden response.
